bug.short_desc: The LIST-EXTENDED option "RETURN (SUBSCRIBED)" returns weird data

long_desc.thetext:
I noticed that the Trojita IMAP client does not show some mailboxes (kde bug #350791). With some help from Jan Kundrát we figured out that apparently the problem comes from Cyrus returning weird data as a response to:
> LIST "" "%" RETURN (SUBSCRIBED CHILDREN)
Quoting the downstream (Trojita) bugreport:
> Mailboxes which are children of a non-existent folder are not listed in > Trojita. > > The following mailboxes are present on the server: > ``` > . list "" "*" > * LIST (\Noinferiors \HasNoChildren) "/" INBOX > * LIST (\HasNoChildren) "/" Drafts > * LIST (\HasNoChildren) "/" Sent > * LIST (\HasNoChildren) "/" Trash > * LIST (\HasNoChildren) "/" XXX/XXX1 > * LIST (\HasNoChildren) "/" XXX/XXX2 > * LIST (\HasNoChildren) "/" XXX3 > * LIST (\HasChildren) "/" XXX4 > * LIST (\HasNoChildren) "/" XXX4/XXX5 > * LIST (\HasNoChildren) "/" XXX4/XXX6 > * LIST (\HasChildren) "/" "Shared Folders/Spamfilter" > * LIST (\HasNoChildren) "/" "Shared Folders/XXX7" > . OK Completed (0.050 secs 19 calls) > ``` > > But only the following are being displayed in Trojita: > ``` > INBOX > Drafts > Sent > Trash > XXX3 > XXX4 > XXX4/XXX5 > XXX4/XXX6 > ``` > > So, `XXX` and `Shared Folders` (and their sub-mailboxes) are missing in > Trojita. > > However, in addition to these mailboxes, Trojita also displays another one, > which does not exist on the server: `sent-mail`. I cannot open this mailbox > in Trojita or display its contents. > > ``` > * OK [CAPABILITY IMAP4rev1 LITERAL+ ID ENABLE MUPDATE=mupdate://cyrus-portal/ > STARTTLS AUTH=PLAIN AUTH=LOGIN SASL-IR] cyrus-portal01 Cyrus IMAP Murder > v2.4.17-Fedora-RPM-2.4.17-8.el7_1 server ready > > . starttls > . OK Begin TLS negotiation now > ... > > . login ... > . OK [CAPABILITY IMAP4rev1 LITERAL+ ID ENABLE ACL RIGHTS=kxte QUOTA > NAMESPACE UIDPLUS NO_ATOMIC_RENAME UNSELECT CHILDREN MULTIAPPEND BINARY > CATENATE CONDSTORE ESEARCH SORT SORT=MODSEQ SORT=DISPLAY > THREAD=ORDEREDSUBJECT THREAD=REFERENCES ANNOTATEMORE LIST-EXTENDED WITHIN > QRESYNC SCAN XLIST URLAUTH URLAUTH=BINARY X-NETSCAPE > MUPDATE=mupdate://cyrus-portal/ LOGINDISABLED AUTH=PLAIN AUTH=LOGIN > COMPRESS=DEFLATE IDLE] User logged in SESSIONID=<...> > > . namespace > * NAMESPACE (("" "/")) (("Other Users/" "/")) (("Shared Folders/" "/")) > . OK Completed > > . list "" "%" > * LIST (\Noinferiors \HasNoChildren) "/" INBOX > * LIST (\HasNoChildren) "/" Drafts > * LIST (\HasNoChildren) "/" Sent > * LIST (\HasNoChildren) "/" Trash > * LIST (\Noselect \HasChildren) "/" XXX > * LIST (\HasNoChildren) "/" XXX3 > * LIST (\HasChildren) "/" XXX4 > * LIST (\Noselect \HasChildren) "/" "Shared Folders" > . OK Completed (0.040 secs 14 calls) > ```
Please ask me for more information. I can send you complete logs from Trojita in a private email.
See-Also: https://bugs.kde.org/show_bug.cgi?id=350791
